sense.name: 中心, middle,
sense.commentary: This word in Chinese is used as a noun although its translation in English can be used as an adjective.
sense.examples:
商店都开设在城市的中西。
The shops are all in a central position in the city.
交通中心
traffic center

sense.name: center 中心, 中央, 中心点
sense.examples:
她喜欢成为人们注意的中心。
She loves to be the center of interest.
那个新的购物中心真是难看极了。
That new shopping centre is a real eyesore.”

sense.name: middle 中心, 中间
sense.commentary: This word is used as a noun in Chinese although its translation can be used as an adjective.
sense.examples:
你可以找出这个圆形的中心吗？
Can you determine the middle of this circle?
唱盘中心
middle of turntable
半夜我们被大声吵醒。
The noise woke us up in the middle of the might.

sense.name: center,heart, 中心, 中央, 中心点
sense.examples:
她喜欢成为人们注意的中心。
She loves to be the center of interest.
那个新的购物中心真是难看极了。
That new shopping center is a real eyesore.”
这里是市中心。
Here is the heart of the city.
金融区的中心
the heart of the financial district

sense.name: core, 中心, 核心
sense.examples:
这就是所有问题的中心。
This is the core of all the questions.
背斜中心
core of anticline
安全成了新联邦政策的中心问题。
Safety concerns are at the core of the new federal policies.
